caller_intent: The caller (Lori) sought to make a payment on a life insurance policy and requested a waiver of a late payment fee that had accrued due to prior payment difficulties.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the billing account number (17319850) and identified the account holder (Winburn Real Estate LLC).
Agent reviewed the account status, noting a past-due balance of $447 and a $35 late fee.
Agent acknowledged the customer's request to waive the late fee and agreed to do so.
Agent updated the balance to $412 (excluding the waived fee) and confirmed the customer would proceed with payment.
knowledge_required: Late payment fee policies and waiver procedures
Access to billing account details and payment history
Ability to adjust account balances and apply fee waivers
systems_referenced: The Hartford's billing system (for account lookup and balance verification)
Payment processing tools (for applying the waived fee and confirming payment)
summary: A customer contacted The Hartford to resolve a past-due life insurance payment and requested a waiver of a $35 late fee. The agent confirmed the account details, waived the fee, and facilitated the payment process. The call concluded with the customer satisfied and prepared to settle the remaining balance.
